tuv.seg: Case study: Taking parental leave
Cás-staidéar: saoire thuismitheoirí a thógáil
John and Mary want to take parental leave in respect of their son Michael, who is 5 years old
Is mian le John agus Mary saoire thuismitheoirí a thógáil maidir lena mac Michael, atá 5
John has been working for his employer for 9 months and wants to take the leave in 2 months' time
Tá John ag obair dá fhostóir le 9 mí anuas agus is mian leis an saoire a thógáil i gceann 2 mhí
The employer has told John that he cannot spare him at this time and anyway, he is not entitled to parental leave as he hasn't been working for him for a year

Tá sé ráite ag an bhfostóir le John nach féidir é a spáráil ag an am seo agus ar chaoi ar bith, nach bhfuil sé i dteideal do shaoire thuismitheoirí toisc nach bhfuil sé ag obair dó fós ar feadh bliana
John's employer is correct about the length of service
Tá fostóir John ceart faoin tréimhse seirbhíse
After 3 months' service, an employee is entitled to reduced parental leave if the child is nearing the upper age limit
I ndiaidh trí mhí seirbhíse, tá John i dteideal saoire thuismitheoirí laghdaithe má tá an leanbh ag druidim i dtreo aois an uasteorainn
Since the child will not be 8 for another 3 years however, this will not apply to John's claim
Cibé ar bith, os rud é nach mbeidh an leanbh 8 ar feadh 3 bliana eile, ní bhainfidh sé seo le hiarratas John
John should consider taking his leave when he has one year's service
Ba chóir do John smaoineamh faoin saoire thuismitheoirí a thógáil nuair atá bliain amháin seirbhíse aige
John's employer could postpone the leave then on the grounds of for example, the nature of John's duties
D'fhéadfadh fostóir John ansin an saoire a chuir siar ar chúiseanna áirithe, mar shampla, nádúr na ndualgas atá ag John
Unless John is involved in work with a seasonal variation however, the leave could only be postponed once for up to 6 months
Cibé ar bith, mura bhfuil John bainteach le hobair ina mbíonn athrú séasúrach, ní féidir an saoire a chuir siar ach uair amháin suas chomh fada le 6 mhí
Mary has been with her employer for 15 months
Tá Mary ag obair lena fostóir ar feadh 15 mí
Her employer says that parental leave is only for emergencies and in any case, it doesn't apply if the employee has already had 18 weeks' maternity leave
Deir a fostóir go mbaineann saoire thuismitheoirí le cásanna éigeandála amháin agus ar chaoi ar bith, ní bhaineann sí má tá saoire mháithreachais de 18 seachtainí cheana féin tógtha ag an bhfostaí
No, Mary's employer is mistaken
Níl, tá fostóir Mary mícheart
Parental leave is not confined to emergency situations and the only stipulation is that the parent uses the leave to care for the child
Níl saoire thuismitheoirí srianta do chásanna éigeandála agus an coinníoll amháin atá i gceist ná go n-úsáideann an tuismitheoir an saoire chun cúram a thabhairt dá leanbh
Mary's employer may be confusing parental leave with force majeure leave
D'fhéadfadh go bhfuil fostóir Mary measctha suas idir saoire thuismitheoirí agus saoire force majeure
Furthermore, the fact that Mary took maternity leave does not affect parental leave as they are completely separate types of leave set down by different laws
Ina theannta sin, níl aon éifeacht ag an saoire mháithreachais a thóg Mary ar a saoire thuismitheoirí, toisc gur cineálacha saoire go hiomlán ar leith iad, atá leagtha síos ag dlithe difriúla
As a first step, Mary should give her employer at least 6 weeks' written notice of her intention to take parental leave, the starting date and duration

Mar thús, ba chóir do Mary ar a laghad 6 seachtainí fógra scríofa a thabhairt dá fostóir ag cur in iúl go bhfuil sé ar intinn aici saoire thuismitheoirí a thógáil, mar aon leis an dáta tosaigh agus fad an tsaoire
Mary should keep a copy of this notice
Ba chóir do Mary cóip den bhfógra seo a choinneáil
If she has continuing difficulties with her employer, Mary should make a complaint to the Workplace Relations Commission using the online complaint form available on workplacerelations.ie

Má tá deacrachtaí leanúnacha aici lena fostóir, ba chóir do Mary gearáin a chur faoi bhráid an Choimisiúin um Chaidreamh san Áit Oibre tríd an fhoirm ghearáin ar líne a úsáid á fáil ar workplacerelations.ie
